source_span.text_evidence: Many genes of interest in methanotrophs are copper regulated, and it may be necessary to alter the copper concentration to ensure viability and to avoid selection against the genetic modifications.

Cultures are grown under either low copper (0.1 μ M CuSO4) or high copper (10 -25 μ M CuSO4) conditions in liquid cultures and agar plates. Agar plates are incubated in GasPak plate incubation chambers (BD) at 30 ° C, and gas exchange is facilitated by use of a vacuum to create negative pressure inside the chamber followed by gas flow at a 1:1 methane-to-air ratio at

ZnSO4 /C1 7H2O, 0.288; MnCl2 /C1 4H2O, 0.16; H3BO3, 0.06; Na2MoO4 /C1 2H2O, 0.048; CoCl2 /C1 6H2O, 0.048; KI, 0.083

1L/min for 3min.

Homologous recombination of a linear DNA fragment is a technique used for gene disruption, insertion, and modification (Orr-Weaver, Szostak, & Rothstein, 1981; Sharan, Thomason, Kuznetsov, & Court, 2009). One common use of this technique is gene disruption via insertion of a linear DNA fragment containing an antibiotic resistance cassette into the middle of the target gene. Construction of the resulting linear DNA fragment can be performed via several methods, including fusion PCR (Shevchuk et al., 2004).
The three PCR products are then joined together through two rounds of fusion PCR (Fig. 4). PCR products for each round of amplification are isolated and purified through gel extraction.

source_span.text_evidence:
DNA extraction from Ms. trichosporium OB3b is less efficient than DNA extraction from many Type I or Type II methanotrophic bacteria. Existing methods use the neutral lysis/CsCl method or a DNeasy Blood Tissue Kit (Qiagen) for DNA extractions from liquid cultures (Gu et al., 2016; Smith & Murrell, 2011). Instead, an improved method has been developed to extract DNA from cells growing on agar plates using the MasterPure Complete DNA Purification Kit (Epicentre, Cat. The MasterPure Complete DNA Purification Kit protocol has been modified for Ms. trichosporium OB3b:

Add 20 μ L Proteinase K (NEB, 800U/mL) into 300 μ L 2 /C2 tissue and cell lysis solution for each sample.

source_span.text_evidence:
The MasterPure Complete DNA Purification Kit protocol has been modified for Ms. trichosporium OB3b:

Add 20 μ L Proteinase K (NEB, 800U/mL) into 300 μ L 2 /C2 tissue and cell lysis solution for each sample. Incubate the sample at 65 ° C overnight at 500rpm. Place the samples on ice for 5min. Centrifuge the sample at 10,000 /C2 g at 4 ° C for 10min to pellet cell debris. Manually invert the sample 30 times. Centrifuge the sample at 4 ° C for 30min at 20,000 /C2 g to pellet DNA.
Wash the DNA pellet with 750 μ L 70% ethanol on ice.
